short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your project's data for Troy Magennis's Team Dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Troy Magennis has several Excel spreadsheets that use Monte Carlo simulations to aide in forecasting software projects. This plugin will export data from a CA Agile Central project in the exact format required by the Team Dashboard spreadsheet. Simply click the button to export, open, copy the data, and paste into the Team Dashboard.
